input.sentences: checking out possible lodging for a family reunion

output.sentences: The family was all moved out of their house.
The mom went around the kids room to make sure they had all their stuff with them.
They cleaned the floors very well before they moved out.
They left the picnic table they built for the new owners of the house.
She was kind of sad to be leaving the house and said her last goodbye before they drove away.
